Usage: apic {{services:get}} OPTIONS

  Options
    -S, --{{service}} SERVICE_NAME       service name

  Get information about a currently executing service

  Get the Loopback service for the current application
  {{$ apic services:get}}
  name: {{climbon}}
  port: 4001
  supervisor_pid: 4853
  worker_pids: 4854

  Get the {{Micro Gateway}} service
  {{$ apic services:get --service climbon-gw}}
  name: {{climbon-gw}}
  port: 4002
  supervisor_pid: 4855
  worker_pids: 4856
